item.description:
@dagger9090 wrote:

hello, im using deltascape for a source and i would like to know how to make it so when a new player logs on, there attack lvl is already 30,
i do not want people leaving replys that say, player.java or client.java because thats not telling me what to do, i need to no what to look for in player.java.

does it have anything to do with this

	for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) {
		// Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 10;
			playerXP[i] = 1155;
			currentHealth = 99;
			maxHealth = 10;
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}

if (i == 18) {
playerLevel[i] = 1;
playerXP[i] = 10;

		}

if (i == 17) {
playerLevel[i] = 1;
playerXP[i] = 10;
